text: "Ava Adore" is a 1998 song by American band the Smashing Pumpkins and is the lead single from their fourth studio album Adore. It went to number 1 in Iceland, number 2 in Greece, number 5 in New Zealand and also went to the top twenty in Hungary, the United Kingdom, Norway, Sweden, Australia, Canada and Ireland. ==Track listings== All songs written by Billy Corgan == References == Category:1998 songs Category:The Smashing Pumpkins songs Category:Electronic rock songs Category:Synth-pop songs
title: Ava Adore
